item.title: Portugal’s Doctor Shortage Fuels a Two-Way Migration Wave
item.description: More than 2700 Portuguese doctors have requested certificates to work abroad in just 3 years. Medscape News Europe

item.title: Early Vaccination May Have Mitigated Texas Measles Outbreak
item.description: CDC recommendation was associated with increased MMR vaccination early and at routine well-child visits. Medscape Medical News
